interface.name: Product Table
interface.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Community maintained data :) If you see something wrong, lets create the issue and work on it ;) Work in Progress.

about.title: About IBM SW Map
about.primaryText: Repository with the IBM software displayed in a periodic table for easier visualisation of the IBM portfolio. All the data is currently sourced by the community effort and therefore there might be discrepancies. In case you find one, please create the issue in the underlying github repository so it can be corrected.
